gremlins

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.GameObject
      • gremlins.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fireball, Slime

    public class Projectile
extends GameObject
    Projectile class extending Game Object and implementing the Destructible and Moving interfaces. Projectiles moves at a constant velocity and disappear upon collisions.

      Check whether the projectile is destroyed or not.
      void move()
